Row.Text: Our troops have been battling with our enemies on the Valley of Elah. As our customs demand, we need a Champion to decide the outcome of battles in single combat and so terrify our opponents. A Champion of Dagon, our great god, must arise against our weak and febble enemies. A man of Tell es-Safi, called Goliath, has proven to be strong nd terrifying, as well as unusually tall, he could get rid of every enemy with a single hit of his sword.[NEWLINE]
Let's get him the blessing of Dagon our God

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_GoldCost} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and {2_FaithCost} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free stronger Peleset Unit, that earns faith from kills and terrifies nearby oponents.[ENDCOLOR]
We have given Goliath the blessing of Dagon, and he shall be his champion in this battle!
Let's hope no stones are thrown at him

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Cost} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free stronger Peleset Unit that terrifies nearby oponents but may not be upgraded[ENDCOLOR]
We have hired Goliath as the champion of our empire, hoping he won't be defeated eventually
Our troops shall suffice against this enemy
We have decided Goliath is not needed
